channel.title: Infrastructure as Code on Mussell Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure as Code on Mussell Portfolio

item.title: Linux System Administration Automation: From Manual Tasks to Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Reflections on the journey from manual system administration to fully automated infrastructure. Key principles and patterns for successful automation initiatives.

item.title: Linux System Administration Automation: From Manual Tasks to Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Transforming manual Linux system administration tasks into automated, repeatable processes using Infrastructure as Code principles. This project demonstrates configuration management, automated patching, and system hardening workflows.

item.title: Terraform Modules: Building Reusable Infrastructure Components
item.description: Creating reusable Terraform modules for common infrastructure patterns. This project demonstrates module design principles, versioning strategies, and composition patterns for building scalable infrastructure codebases.
